name: Guilt - The Game
description:
In this short survival horror game demo you have to deal with your guilt. the past is history. no matter what you decide to do, the guilt always finds you. you have to deal with your own made mistakes.  

Don't let the guilt finds you! at least you can try to escape.

The game was made from 4 students from bauhaus university who are getting into the world of game development. developing a playable game during a couple months from scratch.

S/o goes to Gianluca Pandolfo for establishing this semester project and giving us honest criticism during the semester. thank you for your effort! :-)

More projects from bauhaus university: https://bauhausuniweimar.itch.io

CONTROLS:

  • Movement with Mouse and Keyboard, Running with Shift
  • E to Interact with several things like lightswitch, doors and many more.

Please use headphones!
